attributes.title: Awakening the World Tour 2012 -  Interview with Yoga Management Magazine
attributes.description: In an interview with the German publication Yoga Management Magazine, Paramahamsa Nithyananda answers questions about his upcoming World Tour, November 2012 through January 2013. Awakening the World involves awakening our own inner potential energy so that we make a spontaneous leap into super-consciousness.  He explains the natural phenomenon that has occurred, as the gravitational field of the Earth is gradually being reduced. This is not a disaster as many fear; rather it is an opportunity to become lighter in being. The reduced gravity affects mainly our thoughts: we have the potential to become more light-hearted and creative.
